name: PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Julian and small pea
description:
PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Julian and small pea
 
PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Julian and small pea PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Julian and small pea PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Julian and small pea PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Julian and small pea PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Julian and small pea
This contains the pattern I used to makethis bear, As you can see, the final look of the bear depends on what type of Fabric You use.
The sewing instructions are also included.



NOTE:
This pattern can Only be provided trough e-mail.If you have special requests consearning this, please contact me.


The bear will be app.7,5" (19cm) high

name: PDF-E-pattern to make a bunny like Lucy
description:
This contains the pattern I used to makethis bunny, As you can see, the final look of the bunny depends on what type of Fabric You use.In the pictured bunny i used viscose
The sewing instructions are also included.
Clothes not included in pattern

NOTE:
This pattern can Only be provided trough e-mail.If you have special requests consearning this, please contact me.

The bunny will be app.12 (30cm) high ears included

name: PDF-E-pattern to make a bear like Mooser, Tucky or Wolli.
description:
This contains the pattern I used to make these three bears, As you can see, the final look of the bear depends on what type of Fabric You use.
The sewing instructions are also included.

Next week I will be adding some sewing kits to my Pussman & co shop (These will NOT CONTAIN the pattern, only the materials)

NOTE:
This pattern can Only be provided trough e-mail.If you have special requests consearning this, please contact me.
Also, instructions to make the clothes are not included.

The bear will be app.11" (27,5cm) high
